DateText: Manuscript: 11th century AH/AD 17th century; Illustration: 1070 AH/AD 1659-1660
Title: Sam Receives Sindukht as Envoy from the King of Kabul
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: On this folio from Walters manuscript W.602 Sam receives Sindukht as envoy from the king of Kabul. There is a later inscription on this illustration bearing the name of the painter Riza with the date 1070 AH/AD 1659-1660.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Qajar; Book; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Iran; Afghanistan; History; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Firdawsi (Persian, died 411-416 AH/AD 1020-1025)
